text: Exciting news for the future of healthcare and medical research! @PrimeHealthcare, @EmVenioResearch, and @HealthWizz have joined forces to launch the EmVenio Research Center at Prime Healthcare. This partnership will expand access to clinical research for patients across the country, ensuring that everyone has a chance to benefit from groundbreaking medical advancements. Kudos to these trailblazers for putting patients first and fostering innovation in healthcare!
